_header: Friars friars woe ye be ministri malorum
_description: Macaronic verses against the Friars — twenty-one lines in couplets

CamTCC1144.First Lines:
ffreers ffreers wo ȝe be ministri malorumffor many a
                    mannes soule brynge ȝe ad penas inffernorum…
CamTCC1144.Last Lines:
…þerffore yll mowyth þei there ffalsi
                    deceptoresffader ffyrst & trinite ffilius atque fflamen__ omnes
                        dicunt
